data.text:
The day before the Selection Race was to be 
held I decided to go for a walk in a nearby park.

Woah woah woah! 
Move! Move outta the way!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Whoo!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: *Jump!*

I looked over and saw Tokai Teio running towards 
me, but at the last second she jumped over me in 
a beautiful manner. Then…
And safe!! Now then… here's your hat!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
It seems like that little girl's hat got stuck 
up a tree and Tokai Teio went and got it for her…

Waah! Thank you so much, Miss! That jump was 
super cool too!!
data.name: Girl A

data.text:
No no no. Don't call me "Miss" call me the 
"Unbeatable Teio-sama"♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Unbeatable…? I don't really 
get it, but it sounds cool!
data.name: Girl A

data.text: Wahahaha!! Feel free to praise me more!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Oh, that's right… Hey you! Sorry 
for scaring you like that.
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
I couldn't hit the brakes and ended up jumping 
over you! You're not hurt anywhere, are you?
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…
choices.processed: <size=29>More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…</size>

choices.text: More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…
choices.processed: <size=29>More importantly, are you okay? That landing must've…</size>

data.text:
Aha! That was nothing for someone like me! See? 
I feel perfect!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Even though she jumped so high, Tokai Teio 
seemed completely fine.

It seems like she's truly blessed 
with an amazing physique, as evidenced 
by that amazing leap she had!
Were you surprised? I bet you were! Hehe♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Wait, I'm busy right now! I was in the middle of 
running. So see ya later!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: After saying that, Tokai Teio nimbly ran off.

For the rest of the day, I couldn't get her out 
of my mind. Then came the Selection Race…

You're doing great, Teio!! Continue this pace 
and overtake the rest of 'em!!
data.name: Crowd

data.text:
Tokai Teio is steadily increasing her position! 
She's pushing gracefully into the lead!
data.name: Commentator

data.text: Hehe… The winner's gonna be me!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Tokai Teio is extending her lead!! 
No one can catch up with her as she 
proceeds forward with ease!!
data.name: Commentator

data.text:
She's four lengths ahead of 2nd place, and 
she's the winner!! The winner of this Selection 
Race is Tokai Teio! This was a beautiful 
display of her strength!!
data.name: Commentator

data.text: Phew! Everyone! How'd you like that race!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Teio, you're the best!!
data.name: Spectator A

data.text: You looked amazing out there!!
data.name: Spectator B

data.text:
Aha, thanks! But hey, of course I of all people 
was able to do it!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Eh? Who're… Ah! You were at the park yesterday! 
Hmm… why're you here?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Ah, I get it! You're a trainer, aren't you!? Now 
that I take a closer look, you've got a badge 
and everything!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
So the reason you're coming to talk to me is… 
You're trying to scout me, aren't you!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: I'd love to be your trainer!
I'd love to be your trainer!

data.text:
Ehehe, what should I do? The thing 
is, even before this race a lot of 
trainers reached out to me.
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Ah! There she is, Tokai Teio!! Your 
racing ability was truly spectacular! 
Please allow me to scout you!!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A

data.text:
Teio, join me! I'm sure that if we work together 
you'll not only be able to win GI races, but 
also the Triple Crown!
data.name: Veteran Trainer A

data.text:
Oh no, they keep increasing!! Umm, if this many 
people approach me I won't be able to decide…
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Well regardless of who I choose, I'll be the one 
running so nothing's really gonna change.
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Guess whoever beats me at rock-paper-scissors 
gets to be my trainer!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Come on now, Teio. An Uma Musume and her trainer 
must work together in perfect harmony…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text: Ahh, Prez!! Preeezz!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
You came to watch my race, didn't you!? Hehehe, 
how did I do!? I won again ya know?!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Haa… Yes, I did come to watch. You did 
amazingly, as usual.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf

data.text:
Yaay!! Ehehe, Prez praised me♪ 
Everyone, did you hear that!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Eh? Ah, yeah… But more importantly 
than that, I would like to…
data.name: Rookie Trainer A

data.text:
What did you just say!? What do you mean by 
"that!?" Hey you, do you not understand just how 
amazing Prez really is!?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
She's the president of Tracen Academy, you 
know!? She's also super fast, super strong, and 
super cool! She's the greatest Uma Musume in the 
world, and my idol!!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
One day I'm gonna be as great as her, then 
she'll praise me a whole bunch♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
And that means that if you really wanna 
scout me, you've gotta truly understand 
just how great Prez is!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Speaking of… Did you all see her debut 
race!? Prez was so amazing, starting 
from the first corner she…!
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
All of the trainers that came to speak with 
Tokai Teio ended up getting lectured on the 
legendary history of "Prez…"

In the end, no one was able to 
talk to her about scouting…
